data.md:MetaData: Lithology of sediment core HOPSTOP, Hopschensee, Switzerland
No laminations. lake. Local vegetation: open water. Area: 1 ha. Lake, dead-ice depression?. Physiography: within last glaciation.
Palynostratigraphy of the last centuries in Switzerland based on 23 lake and mire deposits: chronostratigraphic pollen markers, regional patterns, and local histories
